page.title: 06Leisure At Cliffe Marshes
page.content: Down in the area of the marshes there are many leisure opportunities. Week-ends can see the wind surfer or water skier.In quieter retreats the fisherman contemplates his catch while a bird watcher looks for the herons of the nearby heronry.The peace can be disturbed by the B.M.X bike brigade who enjoy the challenge of the chalk slopes.However,for young and old the marshes provide an area for sport and recreation.Some walk their dogs,some play hide and seek, some simply stop & watch.The children have their own names for the different dens & tell their horror stories of ghosts and murders from days gone by.
